history.proof: intros T U f D Hfilterlimf Hop x Dx. apply Hfilterlimf. apply Dx. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros T U f D Hfilterlimf Hop x Dx.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace f : T -> U D : U -> Prop Hfilterlimf : forall x : T, D (f x) -> filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) Hop : open D x : T Dx : D (f x) Unable to unify "open D" with "locally x (fun x : T => D (f x))".

original: intros T U f D Hfilterlimf Hop x Dx. apply Hop. apply Hfilterlimf. apply Dx.
